abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Loan Project
            will support the first phase of a structural adjustment
            program aimed at achieving balanced and sustainable economic
            growth. This will be accomplished by: (i) introducing basic
            changes in the macroeconomic framework and management; (ii)
            promoting greater economic competition; (iii) providing more
            efficient management of public investment and public
            enterprises; and (iv) laying the groundwork for developing
            well targeted and efficiently run social programs.
